title: Clean sans/semi-sans
content:
Hey guys,

Can someone tell me what this one is?

I need some nice "clean" fonts for corporate web design.

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cleanfont.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085605/http:/typophile.com/files/cleanfont.gif) | 7.49 KB |
author: newbie_chez

comments.content: I like this font, do you think Din is overused?

It is a little overused, but maybe that's because it's a solid and versatile design. I don't know.

[Here's](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085605/http:/typophile.com/node/20442) a thread about DIN alternatives.

- Lex
